admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project will assist the
            development of MARDI over the seven year period 1975-81 by
            providing for the services of internationally recruited
            scientists and specialists (104 man-years), staff
            fellowships for post-graduate training (286 man-years), the
            supply of laboratory, field and workshop equipment and
            supplies, the construction of buildings and the importation
            of improved breeds of all classes of livestock; the
            provision of services of specialists (9 man-years), staff
            fellowships (94 man-years), buildings and equipment of the
            Extension Liaison Unit in the Department of Agriculture. It
            will consist of: (a) commodity research programs for rice,
            field crops, pineapples, cocoa/coconut, livestock as well as
            research programs for agricultural products utilization,
            agricultural engineering and water management; (b) the
            establishment of a Project development unit in MARDI; (c)
            the establishment of an Extension Liaison Unitin the
            Department of Agriculture.
